mapper.select: /* ResCodeDao.selectAllCodeInfoList */ SELECT A.CDGRPID, A.UPPR_CD, A.ORD, A.CD, A.CD_NM FROM TB_CD A, TB_CDGRP B WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.CDGRPID = A.CDGRPID AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CDGRPID, A.UPPR_CD, A.ORD
/* ResCodeDao.selectCodeInfo */ SELECT A.CDGRPID, A.UPPR_CD, A.ORD, A.CD, A.CD_NM FROM TB_CD A, TB_CDGRP B WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.CDGRPID = A.CDGRPID AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CD = #{cd}
